content: Now I've got space to lay out all my tools, mix fertilizer, test the soil, and try out new seeds. I don't have to share my bed with the sproutsies anymore.
info: NPC装修任务 - 云果 - 房屋升级对话_云果

content: {A歪头}Well mah... do you like apples? I love them so much. When I was travelin', I came across an apple grove and stashed a whole bunch of 'em.
info: NPC装修任务 - 云果 - 房屋升级对话_云果

content: It's my secret recipe! After a long day's work, one big sip and — ahh! Satisfaction~ {A害羞冒烟}<style=SizeSmall>It's my favorite, so I kinda hope you'll like it too...</style>
info: NPC装修任务 - 云果 - 房屋升级对话_云果

content: I've just changed floors and wallpaper for the new house. It looks totally different now! If mah, if you have time, you're welcome to come play anytime~!
info: NPC装修任务 - 云果 - 房屋升级对话_云果

content: Before goin' on the trip, I dug up some bamboo from Gran'mama's place. I still have a lickle left, so I mixed them with the apples and whipped up a cup of <style=Highlight>Bamboo Apple Slushie</style>. Wanna give it a try mah?
info: NPC装修任务 - 云果 - 房屋升级对话_云果

content: {A期待}<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, the new home you built for me... it's more than I ever hoped for! It's just... really, really wonderful!
info: NPC装修任务 - 云果 - 房屋升级对话_云果
